author: Staff Reporter
text:
A 39-year-old air passenger who arrived here from Dubai in the early hours of Monday was taken into custody for allegedly smuggling gold worth Rs. 45 lakh.

An airport official said the passenger, Mohammed Ansar of Sankarapuram in Villupuram, arrived from Dubai by AI 906 flight and was intercepted. He was found carrying 1.5 kg of gold concealed in two emergency lamps, which were detected by customs officials, they said.

He was taken into custody for questioning, they added.
title: Man held for smuggling gold worth Rs. 45 lakh
